Pomegranate Healthy: Plant certified clean planting material, maintain wide spacing (5Ã—4 m), prune annually in winter for open vase shape and good airflow, ensure excellent drainage, avoid wounding trunk, apply balanced NPK + micronutrients, drip irrigation only, spray copper oxychloride 0.25% or Bordeaux mixture once before monsoon and once after fruit set as preventive, remove and burn fallen leaves/fruits regularly.
Pomegranate diseased: Prune and burn infected twigs/fruits immediately, rake and destroy fallen infected material, spray streptocycline 0.01% + copper oxychloride 0.25% + mancozeb 0.2% alternately every 15 days during monsoon for bacterial blight/oily spot, drench basin with trichoderma viride + pseudomonas fluorescens or metalaxyl-mancozeb for wilt/root rot, paste pruning wounds with Bordeaux paste.
